mapper.select: select id,userId,inquiryId,currency,deliveryType,productModel,productID, productQuantity,productUnit,refPrice,expectPrice,expectTime,orderTime,status from InquirySheet where status != 3 order by ID limit #{begin},#{pageNum};
select userName from Users where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: update InquirySheet set status = 3 where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
select CONCAT('IS',DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'),RIGHT(CONCAT('00000',(select count(id) from InquirySheet where 0=DATEDIFF(ordertime,NOW()))+1),6))
insert into InquirySheet (userId,address,inquiryId,currency,deliveryType,productModel,productID, productQuantity,productUnit,refPrice,expectPrice,expectTime,orderTime,status) values( #{userId},#{address},#{inquiryId},#{currency},#{deliveryType},#{productModel},#{productID}, #{productQuantity},#{productUnit},#{refPrice},#{expectPrice},#{expectTime},NOW(),0)
mapper.update: update InquirySheet set userId=#{userId},inquiryId=#{inquiryId}, currency=#{currency}, deliveryType=#{deliveryType}, productModel=#{productModel}, productID=#{productID},productQuantity=#{productQuantity}, productUnit=#{productUnit}, refPrice=#{refPrice},expectPrice=#{expectPrice},expectTime=#{expectTime}, orderTime=#{orderTime},status=#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from InquirySheet where status != 3

select id,userId,inquiryId,currency,deliveryType,productModel,productId, productQuantity,productUnit,refPrice,expectPrice,expectTime,orderTime,status from InquirySheet where userId=#{userId} and status=0 order by ID DESC limit #{page.begin},#{page.pageNum};

select id,userId,inquiryId,currency,deliveryType,productModel,productId, productQuantity,productUnit,address,refPrice,expectPrice,expectTime,orderTime,status, getAddressName(address) as inquiryAddressName,getAddressNameShoppingCart(address) as inquiryAddressNames, getProductName(ProductID) AS productName, getProductPic(ProductID) AS productPic from InquirySheet where userId=#{userId} and status=0
and FIND_IN_SET(inquiryId,#{ids})>0
and inquiryId like CONCAT('%',#{inquiryId},'%')
and getProductName(ProductID) like CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%')
AND orderTime like CONCAT('%',#{orderTime},'%')
AND status =#{status}
order by ID DESC limit #{page.begin},#{page.pageNum};

select count(ID) from InquirySheet where userId=#{userId} and status=0
and FIND_IN_SET(inquiryId,#{ids})>0
and inquiryId like CONCAT('%',#{inquiryId},'%')
and getProductName(ProductID) like CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%')
AND orderTime like CONCAT('%',#{orderTime},'%')
AND status =#{status}
order by ID DESC;
